description:
Kid the Phantom Thief accepts another challenge from old man Suzuki, which means Conan will be on the scene, too. Although given short notice, Kaito tries to think of a show-stopper of a trick to impress his rival and get away with the jewels.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: KIDvsコナン 月下の瞬間移動
Kid VS Conan : téléportation au clair de lune
Kid vs Conan: Gekka no Shunkan`idou
Kid vs Conan: Teleportation Under the Moonlight
